text: Ordered special fried rice for take out. The staff was super friendly and I was served quickly. The food was flavourful and the best I had so far.
One of the BEST places in Ontario for delicious and fresh Carribean dishes. Very friendly staff and the food is always served quickly and hot. Highly recommended!!

The fried seafood is amazing. The Wings always come in different portions which I dont like because I am a regular customer. I dislike the chicken curry it has no taste and is bland. Also have have have had better fried rice. I like the place for chilling on a friday night.
